companyDescription: At Zafer AI, I worked on the redesign of the platform’s web and mobile interfaces, focusing on making complex blockchain and AI features accessible. I established separate, platform-specific design systems for iOS and Android to ensure a native feel for all users. Beyond visual design, I implemented WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards, delivered an enterprise-ready white-label application, and created scalable guidelines that improved the workflow between our design and development teams.

Web.title: Dashboard Redesign
Web.problemStatement: The dashboard was confusing and lacked mobile responsiveness. Users were struggling to access their key actions at a single glance.
Web.solution: The dashboard was redesigned using a mobile-first approach, prioritizing and highlighting key user actions.
Web.achievements: This reduced user cognitive load, enabled users to achieve their goals more efficiently, and significantly decreased task completion time.

Web.title: Signing View Redesign
Web.problemStatement: The dashboard was confusing and lacked mobile responsiveness. Users were struggling to access their key actions at a single glance.
Web.solution: The dashboard was redesigned using a mobile-first approach, prioritizing and highlighting key user actions.
Web.achievements: This reduced user cognitive load, enabled users to achieve their goals more efficiently, and significantly decreased task completion time.

Web.title: Vault Redesign
Web.problemStatement: The Vault interface utilized an outdated design with inconsistent action naming and a fragmented layout, leading to user confusion and high cognitive load.
Web.solution: Redesigned the interface using a unified design system and brand guidelines. This included standardizing typography, harmonizing action labels, and restructuring table columns to prioritize the most relevant information.
Web.achievements: Significantly improved scanability and reduced user reaction time, enabling users to identify and execute key actions with greater speed and clarity.

Web.title: Project View
Web.problemStatement: Users needed a way to process high-volume document requests involving complex, nested folder hierarchies, which traditional flat-file signing workflows could not support.
Web.solution: Designed a seamless folder management and navigation system that allows users to upload entire directory structures and batch-sign documents while maintaining clear visibility of the file hierarchy.
Web.achievements: Enabled enterprise-scale document processing by simplifying complex data management, allowing users to execute high-volume signing tasks without the cognitive overhead of tracking individual files manually.

Web.title: AI Support Bot
Web.problemStatement: The platform lacked an efficient way for users to resolve minor issues instantly, often requiring manual intervention from the support team.
Web.solution: Developed a custom AI-powered support bot utilizing modern AI design guidelines to ensure a seamless, intuitive, and conversational user experience.
Web.achievements: Enabled users to resolve minor issues independently and instantly, significantly reducing the volume of support tickets and improving the overall speed of resolution.

Web.title: AI Envelope Summarizer - V1.0
Web.problemStatement: Users struggled to quickly understand the key points of complex documents, leading to delays and potential errors during the signing process.
Web.solution: Developed an AI-powered envelope summarizer that automatically extracts and presents the most relevant information from documents, such as dates, parties, and key clauses, in a concise and easy-to-read format.
Web.achievements: Enabled users to quickly grasp the essential details of documents, streamlining the signing process and reducing the time and effort required to review complex contracts.

Web.title: Add Reviewer Step
Web.problemStatement: Signers frequently required a verification step to validate envelope data, as the lack of oversight led to data entry errors and workflow bottlenecks.
Web.solution: Introduced an optional 'Reviewer' role that can be added to any signer in the workflow. The feature was seamlessly integrated into the existing UI to ensure high adoptability with minimal user training.
Web.achievements: Significantly improved document accuracy and reduced the error rate of finalized envelopes by catching discrepancies early in the process.

Web.title: Unique Custom ID
Web.problemStatement: Enterprise clients lacked a standardized way to track documents using internal naming conventions, requiring a customizable ID system to align with organizational taxonomies like department codes and fiscal years.
Web.solution: Designed a centralized configuration interface that allows administrators to build dynamic, custom ID formats using variables. The entire state management for ID creation was consolidated into a single, streamlined view.
Web.achievements: Empowered enterprise users to automate document indexing, ensuring consistent organization across thousands of envelopes and simplifying cross-departmental tracking.

Web.title: Privacy & Security
Web.problemStatement: The introduction of biometric and passkey authentication requirements necessitated a more robust and organized approach to user security management.
Web.solution: Designed a centralized Security and Privacy hub that consolidates all authentication methods and privacy settings into a single, intuitive interface, rather than treating them as isolated features.
Web.achievements: Simplified the user journey for sensitive security configurations, reducing cognitive load and empowering users to manage their account protection with greater confidence and speed.

Web.title: Async Processing
Web.problemStatement: Long-running tasks such as document signing and bulk downloads utilized blocking UI patterns, forcing users to wait and preventing them from performing other actions within the app.
Web.solution: Designed an asynchronous background task manager with a non-intrusive popover notification system, allowing users to monitor progress while continuing their workflow uninterrupted.
Web.achievements: Massively improved multi-tasking efficiency and reduced idle time, particularly for power users managing multiple concurrent background processes.

Web.title: Notification Panel - V1.0
Web.problemStatement: The platform lacked a centralized notification system, forcing users to manually search for updates and actionable items, which created significant workflow delays.
Web.solution: Designed a context-aware notification panel that categorizes alerts into actionable tasks, informational updates, and system alerts. The UI dynamically adjusts based on the notification type to present the most relevant next steps.
Web.achievements: Transformed notifications into an interactive hub, allowing users to execute tasks directly from the panel. This streamlined the workflow and drastically reduced the time spent navigating the system to locate pending actions.

Web.title: AI Assign Label (Conceptual)
Web.problemStatement: Users were burdened by the manual task of searching for and assigning labels to every incoming envelope, creating a repetitive and time-consuming workflow.
Web.solution: Designed an AI-driven suggestion engine that automatically identifies and recommends relevant labels for envelopes, featuring a streamlined 'one-click' assignment interface.

Web.title: AI Document Maker (Conceptual)
Web.problemStatement: Users faced a fragmented workflow by having to use external editors, while the manual process of drafting professional documents from scratch was time-consuming and prone to formatting errors.
Web.solution: Developed a native, benchmarked document editor featuring an integrated AI-generative engine. This enables users to generate complete documents from a single prompt and perform high-fidelity edits within the 'Zafer' ecosystem before saving or routing for signature.

Website.title: Website V3.0
Website.problemStatement: The V.20 website content was not clear enough for users to understand the value proposition.
Website.solution: The whole website was redesigned to be more user-friendly and to better communicate the value proposition.
Website.achievements: Improve content hierarchy which resulted in clear communication of the value proposition for new customers as well as stakeholders.

Website.title: Website V2.0
Website.problemStatement: The content hierarchy was not clear enough for users to understand the value proposition and it had previous branding
Website.solution: The whole site was rebranded with a new logo and color scheme to match the new brand identity.
Website.achievements: Rebranded the website communicated the purpose of Zafer to users.

iOS.title: Project View
iOS.problemStatement: Users needed a way to process high-volume document requests involving complex, nested folder hierarchies, which traditional flat-file signing workflows could not support.
iOS.solution: Designed a seamless folder management and navigation system that allows users to upload entire directory structures and batch-sign documents while maintaining clear visibility of the file hierarchy.
iOS.achievements: Enabled enterprise-scale document processing by simplifying complex data management, allowing users to execute high-volume signing tasks without the cognitive overhead of tracking individual files manually.

iOS.title: Envelope Workflow
iOS.problemStatement: Mobile users lacked visibility into the document signing lifecycle, making it impossible to track recipient progress or identify bottlenecks while away from their desktops.
iOS.solution: Introduced an intuitive, flowchart-inspired tracking UI optimized for mobile screens. This system visualizes complex multi-signer workflows, displaying real-time statuses and branching logic through a clean, interactive map.
iOS.achievements: Significantly improved transparency and user trust by providing a clear 'birds-eye view' of the document journey, reducing the need for manual follow-ups and status inquiries.

iOS.title: AI Envelope Translator
iOS.problemStatement: Users faced challenges understanding legal or official documents sent in foreign languages, leading to delays, confusion, and potential errors during the signing process.
iOS.solution: Integrated an AI-powered translation engine with an intuitive language picker, allowing users to instantly translate envelope content into their local language without leaving the interface.
iOS.achievements: Enhanced global accessibility and user confidence by removing language barriers, resulting in faster document turnaround times and a significant reduction in cross-border communication friction.

iOS.title: AI Envelope Summarizer

iOS.solution: Developed an AI-powered envelope summarizer that automatically extracts and presents the most relevant information from documents, such as dates, parties, and key clauses, in a concise and easy-to-read format.
iOS.achievements: Enabled users to quickly grasp the essential details of documents, streamlining the signing process and reducing the time and effort required to review complex contracts.

iOS.title: AI Autofill Envelope
iOS.problemStatement: Users often had to manually enter information into envelopes, leading to errors and delays in the signing process.
iOS.solution: Developed an AI-powered envelope autofiller that automatically populates envelope fields based on the document content, such as parties, dates, and key clauses, reducing the time and effort required to prepare envelopes.
iOS.achievements: Enabled users to quickly and accurately prepare envelopes, streamlining the signing process and reducing the time and effort required to prepare envelopes.

iOS.title: AI Grammar Checker
iOS.problemStatement: Manual data entry often led to grammatical and spelling errors in legal documents, undermining the professional credibility of the sender and risking misunderstandings.
iOS.solution: Integrated an AI-powered 'One-Click Correct' feature that identifies linguistic errors in real-time and allows users to apply professional-grade corrections instantly within the editor.
iOS.achievements: Significantly improved document quality and professional standards while reducing the time users spent on manual proofreading and editing.

iOS.title: AI Support Bot
iOS.problemStatement: The platform lacked an efficient way for users to resolve minor issues instantly, often requiring manual intervention from the support team.
iOS.solution: Developed a custom AI-powered support bot utilizing modern AI design guidelines to ensure a seamless, intuitive, and conversational user experience.
iOS.achievements: Enabled users to resolve minor issues independently and instantly, significantly reducing the volume of support tickets and improving the overall speed of resolution.

iOS.title: In-app Purchases
iOS.problemStatement: Mobile users lacked a centralized way to manage their subscriptions, resulting in a fragmented experience when trying to identify their current plan, upgrade, or modify their billing status.
iOS.solution: Designed an intuitive, native in-app purchase and subscription management interface, benchmarked against industry leaders to ensure a frictionless checkout and plan-switching experience.
iOS.achievements: Streamlined the monetization lifecycle within the app, reducing support inquiries related to billing and increasing the likelihood of plan upgrades through a clear, transparent comparison layout.

iOS.title: Privacy & Security
iOS.problemStatement: The introduction of biometric and passkey authentication requirements necessitated a more robust and organized approach to user security management.
iOS.solution: Designed a centralized Security and Privacy hub that consolidates all authentication methods and privacy settings into a single, intuitive interface, rather than treating them as isolated features.
iOS.achievements: Simplified the user journey for sensitive security configurations, reducing cognitive load and empowering users to manage their account protection with greater confidence and speed.

iOS.title: Business Card
iOS.problemStatement: Enterprise users lacked a professional, digital method to share their business credentials and contact details within the platform, hindering networking and organizational transparency.
iOS.solution: Designed a digital business card interface inspired by high-end physical cards, featuring granular privacy controls that allow users to toggle the visibility of specific professional data points.
iOS.achievements: Empowered users with a professional digital identity that balances information sharing with personal privacy, facilitating smoother business interactions and internal networking.

companyDescription: During my internship, I worked on end-to-end design tasks including user journeys, sitemaps, and prototypes. I helped build UI component libraries to keep client branding consistent and designed the full flow for a dating app, moving from simple sketches to polished, interactive designs.

I built landing pages aimed at attracting new customers and improving user retention. I also developed simple proof-of-concept apps to test out new feature ideas and took part in design sprints to help update and improve the company’s branding.

Web.title: Clininc Dashboard Demo Development
Web.problemStatement: Prospective clinicians were unable to experience Vetstoria's value proposition prior to purchase, creating a hurdle in the sales cycle and slowing down user acquisition.
Web.solution: The team came up with building a HTML replicate of the existing vet clinician dashboard to display some of the crucial features that are provided to them. I was assigned to develop the V1.0 HTML prototype.

Web.title: Vetstoria UI/UX Guidelines Development
Web.task: Collaborated with the UI/UX Lead to establish comprehensive design guidelines for Vetsroia's booking tool and clinic dashboard. Developed high-fidelity HTML prototypes to validate design principles and ensure technical feasibility.

Web.title: Customer Acquisition Landing Page Development
Web.task: Contributed to a cross-functional team in developing a customer acquisition landing page featuring a dynamic vet-locator tool to help users find and book with Vetstoria-registered practices.
